title_job: Dynamics 365 Planning and Implementation Expert Needed
description: We are seeking a skilled professional with expertise in Dynamics 365 for planning and implementation projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Microsoft Dynamics 365, showcasing a proven track record of successful deployments. You will be responsible for assessing needs, strategizing implementation plans, and ensuring smooth integration into existing processes. Excellent communication and problem-solving skills are essential for this role.  Since our project is for one of our clients we would need to know if you are happy working via our I.T team in conjunction with the client (end user).
